entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay test failure #96585
  • possibly memory leak in .net 8 #96581
  • MemoryExtensions.Split with white space seprator and StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries trims the seprator of last range if destination isn't enough long #96579
  • Request: I really want a best and official .NET PDF library from dotnet team. #96576
  • Problem with ComInterfaceGenerator.Tests build #96572

Closed

  • Potential redundant field in MethodDesc #96474
  • After Using System.Text.Json, Code Execution Differs in PublishAot. #96548

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some IDExx analyzer suggestions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #96584
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up some of the ARM32 bit rotten code #96583
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix links in features.md #96582
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Avoid cloning cold descendant loops quadratically #96580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security
  • Improve performance of `Enumerable.ToDictionary()` #96574
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Using HashSet instead of Dictionary multiple times #96573
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • PGO: Profiled SequenceEqual #96571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (5/N) #96526
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] fix CaptureContextFromParameter and SealJSImportCapturing #96504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96561
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Remove `BBJ_RETURN` loop cloning quirk #96555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove IV analysis quirk in loop cloning #96563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet-format` reports errors *only* in `--verify-no-changes` mode for ?: expressions #37812

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove extraneous issue template option #37805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Extension lowering #7771
  • [Proposal]: Improved Definite Assignment Analysis #4465
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Created

  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md to Fix Reference to Incorrect Type #7824

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent ambiguous implicit conversions for tuples #71524
  • Members, used only in DebuggerDisplay for "Name" or "Type" reported as unused #71523
  • IDE0300 fix-all skips first diagnostic in a cascading ternary #71522

Closed

  • IDE features don't work with collection expressions + target-typed new #71238
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up Features test layer #71525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove string.Split calls during solution explorer search #71520
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move editor-dependent tests to EditorFeatures #71518
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary WpfFact usage #71517
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix semantic model for target typed collection expression elements #71496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in VB's PENamedTypeSymbol #71515
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Updated

  • Move TestWorkspace to Workspace test layer, add EditorTestWorkspace to EditorFeatures layer #71407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.10
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: single_query #53197
  • Perf improvement: updates, updates #53196
  • Scaffolded form error: EditForm requires either a Model #53195
  • Blazor Web App - HTTP headers missing from inside a component when using IHttpContextAccessor #53192
  • [MinimalAPI] Resolve JsonSourceGenerationOptions for build-in parameter binding and response #53191
  • I really want a best and official .NET PDF library from dotnet team. #53190
  • Complete [Typed]Results Json AOT/trimmer-safe overloads #53189
  • Not able to configure HTTPS endpoint using self signed certificate. #53187

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #53115
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #53180
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53188
  • Blazor Web App - doesn't work Authorisation via the Google #52662
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json #53128
  • Perf regression: updates #53181

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable gRPC tests on MacOS 12 #53186
    area-grpc
  • [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53185
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #53162
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Throw if resolving keyed service from non-keyed container #53051
    pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19726
  • Make AppThemeBinding type public #19725

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimized model no longer using correct schemas in EF 8.0.0 #32739
  • Cleanup output-path behavior when generating migrations #32738

Closed

  • Overriding Parameters property of SqliteCommand does not work #27706

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --disable-build-servers to bundle command #32737

Merged

  • Automatic use of C# collection initializers #32736
  • Automatic use of C# primary constructors #32509

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605
    blocked
